title: Kicked from champ select
body: Champ select just ended at 0 seconds fir blood moon, said someone dodged or didn't pick a champ, (thought it was odd but k it happens) get into new champ select, chose a champ, then change my mind and pick a different champ, counter hits 0, I'm kicked for not choosing a champion and I have a 6 minute ban. Any ideas what's going on?

replies.body: Did you finish locking in your champ before the timer hit 0? If not, that's likely why you were removed from the champ select.
